desc: RingOn - a wearable Personal Safety device sized for a child’s finger. Serves both as a panic button and a GPS tracker.

layout.text: RingOn is a ring-shaped, GPS tracker with a panic button to help parents track their kids, and monitor their safety.
We believe the best solutions are those that fit into our everyday routines – like a smart ring that children will want to wear that's not only stylish but also functional.
